description:
Connor now has a robot of his own, Cubix. Unfortunately, his dad Graham doesn`t feel the same way about robots - and kicks Cubix out of the house. Charles, the mayor`s son, also has a new robot - Quixtreme 5000! While they`re playing cat and mouse at the Botties Pit, a Lectrix shows up - not feeling well. A Lectrix robot goes berserk at the Bubble Town charging station.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: オレの友だちコンボック
